text: Tabe ki apanara prati ya nayila kara hayecha tara kichu apani barjana karabena ebam tate apanara mana sankucita habe ejan'ya ye, tara bale, ‘tara kache dhana-bhandara namano haya na kena athaba tara sathe phiris‌ta ase na kena?’ Apani to kebala satarkakari ebam allah‌ sabakichura karmabidhayaka
